body:
@mmcdole Such questions are better off on [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/go), golang-nuts, or other forums. Also more people would be able to help you if you provide an [MCVE](http://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve).

The workaround I originally proposed at [golang-ru](https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-ru/qoNDWMFR988/4vs7pW2OZNgJ) is to replace all namespaced attributes in test with a modified one, i.e. replace `<itunes:author>` with `<itunes:_author>` and then unmarshal it into a separate field. I don't know whether it could help you.
